solution_line_template: Linda wants to do {num_coats} coats, so the total area she will be painting is {num_coats} coats * {wall_area_per_coat} sq. ft./coat = <<{num_coats}*{wall_area_per_coat}={total_area_to_paint}>>{total_area_to_paint} sq. ft.

A gallon of paint will cover {coverage_per_gallon} sq. ft., so Linda will need {total_area_to_paint} sq. ft. / {coverage_per_gallon} sq. ft. per can = <<{total_area_to_paint}/{coverage_per_gallon}={cans_needed}>>{cans_needed} cans of paint
